title: The Fruit of the Spirit: Self-Control
description:
Readings from:

Proverbs 25:28

Titus 2:1-6

2 Peter 1:5-8

Today's passages were read by Erin Straza, a communications consultant, managing editor for Christ and Pop Culture, co-host of the Persuasion podcast, and author of Comfort Detox: Finding Freedom from Habits That Bind You.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
